issue.title: KeyWord GEMET
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

I added a keyword GEMET field in my catalog. In the form I can't access to the gemet service, I just have a combobox (see image attached)

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This is not a bug, It was just a wrong configuration.

But I found an other bug.

The hard coded Inspire theme service : http://inspire.jrc.it/theme/ is wrong
The good one is : http://inspire-registry.jrc.ec.europa.eu/registers/FCD/items/

This path should not be hard coded but available in the configuration form.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Hello Thomas,

Good to read that it's not a bug. Can you explain us the right config to do ?Â¨
(should be wrote somewhere in the WIKI...)

Thanks

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Thomas, 

Any news on this issue ?
Does any change will come with next release of CATALOG ?

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Thomas, any relevant info ?
I think this ticket should be rejected, am I right ?

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Please Thomas, any update on this ?
